title: Weird dreams, gargs, and grammar:
content:
You all think you had weird dreams:

In my dream, I wake up, and its morning. We all hop in the car, and end up in France (I don't know why I didn't relize I was dreaming yet; I live in the United States). We go to an amuzment park, and I go on a roller coaster, which turns into an airplane ride over the pacific. I instantly fall through the plane, and see the words "No Clipping On" appear over my head. My first dreamish though was that my brother had sneaked on the pc when he shouldn't, but then I relized his debug keys wern't active (I still don't believe it, but it felt sooo real). Then I was underwater, and then I sort of realized I was dreaming... I then relized, that because it was a dream, I could breath underwater. I was enjoying breathing the water till I woke up. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img]

-----------------------------------------------------

BTW - Have you ever had a dream you were falling (or skydiving), and as soon as you hit the ground, you compleatly wake up, and jump to a sitting position?

It is sooo wierd. I've had a few of those. It is sooo weird.

(This is my first post here, but I'm an active member at Keen:Modding)

-- NAJAWA --

Edit: I changed the title of the post due to the ange of topics posted. they do follow a logical flow, but the previous title, "Now this is weird," just wasn't good enough anymore.

title: Soooo Sorry
content:
I am sooo sorry for the way I've been acting on that forum, and because of that, I swore compleate silence until I released my mod, or at least a demo.
[url=http://andy.durdin.net/keen/modding/viewtopic.php?t=624&postdays=0&postorder=asc&start=45]andy.durdin.net/keen/modd...c&start=45[/url]
I really want to fit in, and not ware the lable "Mr. Spam's A-Lot" I just want to be silent until everybody understands I joined the forum because Keen is my favorite topic: I love Keen more than almost anything! I geuss I just got carried away.

I also, here, will swear forum silence (just so people don't think I took my rambling elsewhere). I geuss this is the opprotunity I need to just work on my own mods, fangames, and that website I wanted to build. I now promise that I will not post anything until I have released a mod, or at least a demo.

(Just, please don't delete my account due to inactivity)

-- NAJAWA; signing off --

title: Discernment.
content:
It's not necessary to be completely silent. When you go to post something, before submitting it compare it with the original topic and make sure you're still talking about the same thing. It's as simple as that.

There are exceptions--sometimes discussions tend to go off on a slight tangent and still contribute to the purpose of the thread. In grey areas like this, it's up to you to discern what fits and what doesn't. For most topics, though, it should be fairly obvious.Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

The development of the hardware, and the greater ability to express every idea that flies into a programmers head, mean that game creators have made the new games congested with every technique in their power. The basic games behind all this are so blurred that people cant catch up. We should go back to basics like Pac-Man and play in an easier, more relaxed way. -Toru Iwatani

[url=http://jimsoft.spatang.com/]JimSoft Lair[/url]

content:

title: Re: Out of silence:
content:
No, because it's in the present tense. If it were in the past tense (ie "We all hopped in the car" as opposed to "We all hop in the car") then it would be "fell". (Isn't English fun?)[url=http://www.toxicsheep.com]www.toxicsheep.com[/url]
[img]http://www.toxicsheep.com/sigs/scrobblersig.php[/img]

title: Re: Out of silence:
content:
If you fell all trees on a mountain in one fell swoop, that still doesn't make it a fell, not in the past tense, nor in the fall.
I think I need sleep... [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Retodon8
You live, you die, you are remembered, you are forgotten. [url=http://keen.retodon8.net/][img]http://retodon8.net/Graphics/Keen_Yorp.gif[/img][/url]

title: Re: Out of silence:
content: Yes, but that's a different verb - "to fell" rather than "to fall". (I told you English was fun [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] )

title: Eh, right.
content:
Oh darn, I thought it wouldn't show; Latyvo has this one over me:

1)I live in Wisconson, in the United states (I said so in my dream), (BTW - Good sluthing Retodon8, You are right. It is a small town, but very nice. Latyvo moved away from New Berlin a month before he joined K:M).
2)I hate English class.
3)I really don't take the time to proof-read my posts.
4)I'm only 13, and am a miserable wretch.
5)I mod keen, not proof-read posts.

If you have any other questions, please tell me. If I don't like the question, I just won't answer them. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mischief.gif[/img]

And I'd like to make it up to you KR. Here, accept my gift:

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-garg.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-garg.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-garg.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-garg.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-garg.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-garg.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-garg.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-garg.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-garg.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-garg.gif[/img]

10 trained gargs. They won't eat you, their too 'fed' up with me to notice you.

1) Give them lots of water
2) Take them for walks, but not in public (They haven't been trained enough not to eat in public yet)
3)Give them enough food, or they might grind their teeth a bit, and then they'll... Well, just feed them, and you'll be all right. hey perfer yorps. here's 7, they should last you a week.
[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-yorp.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-yorp.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-yorp.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-yorp.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-yorp.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-yorp.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-yorp.gif[/img]
4)At night, keep them in a strong cage, or your "Thank you sooo much Najawa" post might be your last. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-deadkeenvort.gif[/img]

-- NAJAWA --

content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]If you fell all trees on a mountain in one fell swoop, that still doesn't make it a fell, not in the past tense, nor in the fall.[hr][/quote]

Fell: to cut down. i.e Keen felled the trees.

2.) Rapid [Origionally unpleasant] As used in the phrase 'one fell swoop' meaning in one single [usually rapid] movement. Suspected to origionate from a falcons habit of killing its prey.A proud member of the signature stealing society

title: KR & GARG DIALOG CONTINUED
content:
...

NJW: Oh. Don't worry KR, I'll be a good modderator.

KR: Give them lots of water, and good food for thought, and delete threads that are rotting.

NJW: Got'ya

CommanderSpleen: We'll miss you KR, but we'll hold you in our memories as the first person to land on mars in VGA. We'll always remember how you... *wispers* is he gone?

Whoot!!!

-- 3 years later --

CNN: NAJAWA, Levellord, and CommanderSpleen have finnally been arested on charges for releasing Gargs to unsuspecting victims. Bob?

Bob (From CNN): People, a Garg may look cute, but it is as dangerous as a tiger cub; they look cute, but eat...

MSNBC: ... Have been arresed for giving gargs to the following: Harvey, Andy Durdin, Superadammario, Xky Rauh, Ilsoap, Cellik, and many other people. The relation; they all are in the modding industry, and are all used to seeing gargs... just not the live ones.

ABC NEWS: ... And will be sentances to the Garg's pit!!!

BBC NEWS: ... And will recieve an even greater punishment than they ever conceived; for the gargs are only slightly hungry, and will just sample them here, and there...

Moral of the story, LL, CSpleen, lets not give out any more gargs. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-deadkeenvort.gif[/img]

title: Re: KR & GARG DIALOG CONTINUED
content:
CNN: Today a horrible massacre just outside of the PCKF, our report Mike Mayers was on the scene. Mike?

Mike: Yes its absolute carnage out here Dave, with a total of four twisted, mutilated bodies littering this once peaceful forum.

Dave: Mike, what sparked this violent rampage by normaly peaceful Keen fans?

Mike: Well the consensus is that the forums inhabitants just had enough of LL's Skit and Najawa's and Harvey's n00Bishness. After a particularly unproductive thread it appears that the entire forum just up and beat three diffferent kinds of skit out of them, which is difficult considering they'd only discovered the third kind last week.

Dave: I hear that there was an innocent victim?

Mike: Yes, RocketJess, an innocent animie fan was battered to death with her own fanart in the choas. Forumers report that she was killed because, and I quote: 'What the hell'

Dave: Thankyou Mike, now, more on rising fuel prices, next.
